entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
